trans-unit.source: Determines what to do when the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener"></xref> object attempts to write to a log and there is less free disk space available than specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace*> property.
trans-unit.target: 決定要執行的工作時<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener"></xref>物件嘗試寫入的記錄檔，而且沒有較少可用磁碟空間超過所指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace*>屬性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property is set to DiscardMessages, the log messages are by default discarded if there is not enough reserved disk space.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>屬性設定為 DiscardMessages、 記錄檔訊息未根據預設，如果沒有捨棄保留的磁碟空間不足。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents simple applications from failing if the disk gets too full.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止簡單應用程式失敗的磁碟空間不足時。

trans-unit.source: For a more robust application, set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property to ThrowException, and add `Try...Catch` blocks around all code that writes to the log.
trans-unit.target: 為更穩固的應用程式，設定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>屬性 throwexception 設定，並加入`Try...Catch`區塊寫入記錄檔的所有程式碼周圍</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>
